scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production browserify -g envify -p [ vueify/plugins/extract-css -o public/Modules/Setting/build.css ] -e src/Pages/Setting/main.js | uglifyjs -c warnings=false -m > public/Modules/Setting/build.js
